name: SYNTHRAVE
description:
SYNTHRAVE

Connect your GUITAR and shred your way across the crowds! Have your fans raise you up and down to avoid the obstacles.

If you have a Guitar Hero controller connected, select the "Play with guitar" option!

  • Green/Red to toggle up
  • Blue/Yellow to toggle down
  • Strum on the beat to move

If you don't have a guitar, you can still play with a keyboard or Xbox controller by selected "Play without"!

  • B/Y/Up arrow to toggle up
  • A/X/Down arrow to toggle down
  • D-Pad up +down / Space on the beat to move
